article:
A 'ram press' is a device or machine commonly used to press items with a
mechanical ram, such as with a plunger, piston, force pump, or
hydraulic ram. In food preparation, there are various kinds of ram presses:

The fruit ram press and [[cider]] ram press are both types of fruit presses
that extract the juices out of the fruit through pressure. The second makes
apple cider.

An [[oil seed]] ram press is also known as an [[Vegetable fats and oils|oil]]
ram press and it extracts the oil out of oil seeds.
